Professor Geller?
(turning towards him) Yes Mr. Lewis, how can I help you?
I know I didn’t do well on my midterms and stuff but, I was kindahoping you could change my grade.
And why exactly would I do that? (Goes back to writing on the board.)

(turning around and dragging the chalk down the board) What?!

No!

He’s got a girlfriend!

Have you seen Chandler?

‘Cause I just keeping thinking about all these things that I’mnot gonna have and it’s freaking me out. I don’t know what to do about it.

No that is the

All right, I’ve never been engaged and I’ve never really beenmarried, but I can only tell you what my mother told me. Whenever you have doubts or fearsor anxieties about a relationship, do

Your mother told you this?

The woman that got married a bunch of times and killed herself when youwere 13?

Hi.

(To Rachel) Take it back?
Absolutely.

Honey, as we get closer to the wedding, is there anything that you wouldlike to talk about or share?
Okay. Well, I think the centerpieces are too big
